snippet.title: Silent Hill 2: Streets of Rage [Openbor]
snippet.description:
Game released by Antyguf
Link:
https://www.chronocrash.com/forum/resources/streets-of-rage-silent-hill.74/
https://openborgames.com/streets-of-rage-silent-hill-openbor

Streets of Rage: Silent Hill is a 2015 fan game developed by BoggyTheWorm using the OpenBoR engine. It's a beat 'em up that mixes Sega's Streets of Rage fighting game and Konami's Silent Hill horror game into one.

This crossover uses several well-known characters such as James (Axel), Maria (Lisa), Angela (Blaze), Travis (Adam), Eddie (Bongo), Heather (Lucia from Final Fight 3), Pyramid Head, and Scarlet.
